short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Warns when accessing certain sites; an anti-phishing extension checking if the site is blacklisted

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Safe Browsing is an advanced anti-phishing extension designed to protect you against online fraudulent threats. The extension compares the domains of the websites you visit against a continuously updated blacklist, alerting you if you are trying to access a dangerous site.
